reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect adaptation of the original book even if the art style is a little weird...
reviews.reviewText: If you like the original book series, check out the graphic novels. While I am not a big fan of the artist, I am a fan of the original story by K.A. Applegate and Michael Grant and these graphic novels follow the original YA novels faithfully. This is great science fiction no matter if you are a kid or an adult. Super underrated series! Highly recommended! Also the book arrived in great condition from the seller which was a Half Price Books. Maybe because it's only been out for a few months. Still, top notch quality and I will order from them again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves this series.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter recently got into this series after seeing a review on You Tube. It didn’t disappoint. I’ll be getting more in the series as rewards for completed class work and chores. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Constant. These books know the soul of the source and are keeping it fresh and alive.
reviews.reviewText: I have felt compelled to write a review for each and every one of these.As a child that read every single Animorphs the month they came out it fills me with joy to see these re-envisioned with such love. I ask myself "how many of these could they actually do? There are 50+ books." and I just hope they keep going. This one doesn't miss a beat. In some ways I felt even more connected to the characters being able to see their soulful expressions rendered so thoughtfully. It's honest, true, and just plain good YA SciFi comicbook writing. More please.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Packaging could’ve been better
reviews.reviewText: The book itself is great however, edges were bent from packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best so far!
reviews.reviewText: Definitely the best of the graphic novel series so far! Chris Grine does an amazing adaptation while making it flow naturally in a new medium. Can't wait for the next!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The condition of the graphic novel was great, and the graphic novel itself was awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal yet again
reviews.reviewText: I really am so grateful to Chris for breathing fresh life and excitement into a series that means so much to me, and for being such an open and fun part of the Animorphs fandom. It's such a privilege to hear about his experiences working with this series in podcasts and on Twitter. I know he won't read this review (since he doesn't read reviews), but if I was able, I'd thank him for bringing my kids (especially Marco, love of my life!!!) into such vibrant pages. I must've taken a dozen screenshots while I read this volume, sending it to friends, gushing about this or that detail. The eyelashes. Jake's little tuft of hair. My baby Marco having such big ol puppy dog eyes. Rachel being so cozy with her blankets. AX. Just Ax.Scholastic, I am begging you to commission this artist beyond just the first six volumes; I will continue to keep buying them for myself and my niblings.
